properties.query:
SOURCE '/ecs/feature-server' | fields @timestamp, @fields
| filter level = "INFO" and ispresent(fields.response_code)
| stats count(*) as ResponseCodeCount by bin(1m)
properties.title: Log group: /ecs/feature-server

properties.query:
SOURCE '/ecs/feature-server' | fields @timestamp, @fields
| filter level = "INFO" and ispresent(fields.response_code)
| stats pct(fields.duration, 99) by bin(1m)
